hadiths.text: Al-Dahhak b. Qais asked al-Nu'man b. Bashir:What did the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) recited on Friday after reciting the Surah al-Jumu'ah (62). He replied: He used to recite, "Had the story of overwhelming event reached you ?

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقْرَأُ بِهِ فِي الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Should Be Recited During The Friday Prayer
